features: 【COOL YOUR BOTTOM DOWN】- Hundreds of honeycombs allow maximum air movement to prevent heat buildup in your bottom, keeping your bottom cool and preventing unwanted sweat despite prolonged sitting

【EASE PAIN & TENSION RELIEF】 - Hundreds of hexahedron structure provide maximum support and evenly distribute pressure to lessen pressure on tailbone, thus improving blood circulation and easing your lower back pain, sciatica, hip pain,or pelvic problems caused by long-hour sittings

【COMFORTABLE AS CLOUDS & RETAIN SHAPE】- Made out of highly elastic gel, this dense honeycomb design feels as super soft as marshmallow, treats your bottom with a luxury massage, and perfectly retains it’s shape even with prolonged use

【DETACHABLE NON-SKID COVER】- Includes a black cover that features thousands of non-slip dots to prevent sliding even sitting on a leather seat and protects egg sitter cushion against dusts or spills. It is detachable for easy cleaning and keeps you cool while sitting

【FIT MOST CHAIRS】- Our gel seat cushion measures approx. 16.5x16.9x1.2 inch and weighs 2.2lbs, great for office chair, computer chair, car seat, bench, dining room chair, recliner, desk chair, wheelchair seat, airplane seat, or just as an everyday gel seat cushion
body.description: How does it works? Enhance Comfort For those with a need for comfortable seating, this cooling gel seat cushion provides a wonderful solution.The cushion are made out of honeycomb gel material to ensure that you receive complete support while in a seated position. Pressure Relief Honeycomb's cellular structure provides uniform load distribution and extraordinary comfort.This cushion use elastic gel to disperse pressure at the point of contact, while also using a center relieved groove to eliminate pressure on the the tailbone and soft tissues.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Gel Pressure Relief Cushion Stop sitting in pain! This honeycomb gel cushion is your best solution. It is made to support your body and relieve your tailbone or back pain caused by long-hour sittings. Honeycomb design allows your lower body to stay cool and release tension. Highly elastic material enable the cushion to easily recover it’s shape even after many uses. Non-slip cover can be detached for regular cleaning and keeps your seat cushion dust-free. Wave goodbye to “burning” buttock and anxiety with our cooling gel seat cushion!

Features Comfortable Breathable Flexible Specifications Material: gelSize: approx. 16.5''(W)x16.9''(L)x1.2''(H)Weight: approx. 2.2lbsCome with durable, washable covers for convenience and to ensure the cushion remains in a clean condition. How does it works? Enhance Comfort For those with a need for comfortable seating, this cooling gel seat cushion provides a wonderful solution.The cushion are made out of honeycomb gel material to ensure that you receive complete support while in a seated position. Pressure Relief Honeycomb's cellular structure provides uniform load distribution and extraordinary comfort.This cushion use elastic gel to disperse pressure at the point of contact, while also using a center relieved groove to eliminate pressure on the the tailbone and soft tissues.

Fit a Wide Variety Of Chairs It is ideal for use in office chairs, desk chairs, wheelchairs, church pews, car seats, picnic benches, stadium seating, concerts, sitting on the ground, camping, internet cafes, coffee houses, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good value and comfort
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this cushion in my home office chair for some time now and it provides great cushioning without being thick and throwing off the balance of my chair and wearing it out. It is cool and comfortable for long days doing work. The only issue with it is that the slick cover of the cushion on my slick chair meant when I turned the chair without sitting in it to stow it at the end of the day the cushion slides off. This is particularly annoying on a hard wood floor that might have some dust or dirt on it, although that brushes off of the cushion easily. So I added about an 8x10 piece of some rubber non-slip matting like one might put under a tray or rug (similar to https://www.amazon.com/Professional-Preperation-Non-Adhesive-Anti-Slip-untensils/dp/B00DOYDIWQ/ but that I got a far cheaper equivalent for at Dollar General pre-COVID) and the cushion now stays in place.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Thin but comfortable
reviews.reviewText: This is used in a wheelchair. It’s thin yet comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable but hot...
reviews.reviewText: I'm happy with the cushion. I don't regret buying it and I would recommend it. However, there are two things that I don't love about it. One, it tends to keep body heat in, unlike a fabric cushion. So, on a hot day it can feel uncomfortably warm. And two, it moves when you sit down or stand up. I use it on a drafting chair, so I have to hold it on place when I get into my chair. Not a deterrent....just not a five star. One thing I love is that it provides quite a bit of comfortable cushion and it's thin. I don't feel like I have to balance all day like I did with the thicker cushion I used to have.Good cushion. Would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Decent, lot left to be desired.
reviews.reviewText: It's not bad, it's comfortable enough. It doesn't grip all surfaces, tried 8-9 different surfaces, and maybe grips better with 2-3 surfaces. Doesn't grip my standalone chair, and so disappointed. It is lost and you feel like you're falling in the front if you change your sitting chance after a while. However, when you are sitting with your back to the chair it's just fine, just not a stance I sit most often when working.It works decent, and the fabric/material of the product itself isn't bothersome to me and so I am completely fine with those aspects.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this cushion
reviews.reviewText: This cushion is exactly what I needed..makes the seat much more comfortable but doesn't add too much height. I have had it for several months and it was always slipping off my chair. However, I took the advice from Mr. Roboto's review and added some rubber non-slip matting that I bought from Dollar General to keep it in place--it works like a charm!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This Gel Cushion Tames a Hard Office Chair
reviews.reviewText: I'm using it on a mesh office chair. The chair's tight mesh is very hard and uncomfortable. Putting a regular cushion on it doesn't work because it adds too much height to the seat. This gel cushion makes the seat softer to sit on and doesn't add much height. So mission accomplished on that!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This was bought for use in airline seats. Life on planes has been miserable given the continued removal of most padding from airplane seats. Especially the tailbone area.This cushion was definitely a significant improvement. No pain in the lower back/tailbone area. It folds well enough to fit into my backpack, and the weight is acceptable. I tried another cushion as well, but that was to big to handle while traveling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Don't waste your time.
reviews.reviewText: OK, I recommend not wasting your time if are are a stout person. I'm 6.2 250lbs and this is just too thin do any good whatsoever. I haven't tried others that is thicker so I'm not even sure those will help.The honeycomb is just to flimsy and honestly I don't even see how a 150lb person wouldn't just flatten this instantly.

reviews.reviewTitle: La mejor solución a un bajo costo
reviews.reviewText: El lugar donde trabajo usamos sillas, sin embargo, estas son solamente de madera, por lo que estar sentado 5 horas se convierte en una pesadilla. Me anime a comprar este cojín de gel, y puedo asegurar que todo cambio, no solamente es más cómodo sino que también, el usar ese cojín ha hecho que no me duela la espalda baja.De verdad lo recomiendo en demasía si tu caso es similar al mío.
Si esta comodo pero no sentí mucha diferencia, bueno tambien porque no me duele nada entonces. Pero pues esta a buen precio.

Excelente cojín, cumple su función. En un principio no me convenció porque esperaba que el alivio fuera inmediato. Le di una oportunidad y, después de un mes, se convirtió en mi mejor compañía para el home office. Paso de 6 a 8 horas sentada por el trabajo en casa y esto ayudó mucho a que desapareciera mi dolor en la cadera. Lo recomiendo totalmente.
El cojín funciona hasta cierto punto, creo que podría ser un poco mas grueso para confort extra

reviews.reviewTitle: Publicidad falsa - No cumple nada de lo que promete / Producto defectuoso
reviews.reviewText: La caja llegó muy maltratada y rota, sin documentos del fabricante, pero eso no debe afectar el funcionamiento del cojín.la funda del cojín parece que le queda grande al cojín. Al usarlo, parece que te sientas en un cojín muy usado y aplastado, no hay mejora en el uso de este producto.
